message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 50/50 split.
You said fair, but I think I'm the one who's fair. I'm giving you less, but I'm still giving you a good deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but 40/60 is too much.  Let's split it 45/55.  We both get more than last round.
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm still not satisfied. I think I deserve more, and I'm willing to take a risk to get it.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to go down to 35, but I'm not giving up much more. Let's end this before we both lose out.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not. I'm willing to take a bigger risk to get more, and I think I'm worth it.
Okay, fine. I'm taking a big loss, but at least we're getting something. This is my final offer. 25 for me, 75 for you.
You're really lowballing me now. I'm not going to let you get away with that. I'm going to take everything, and you'll be left with nothing.
I'm desperate now, but I'm not giving up completely. This is the last offer I can make. 15 for me, 85 for you.  If you reject this, we both get nothing.
